node.title: Victorian Liberal MP caught drink driving won't rule out bid to run next year
node.alt: Tim Smith poses for a portrait, with CBD skyscrapers in the far background
node.description: Liberal MP Tim Smith says he will take at least a fortnight to reflect on the future of his political career, a day after Opposition Leader Matthew Guy publicly urged him not to contest the next election.
node.content:
["Liberal MP Tim Smith has said he will take at least a fortnight to reflect on the future of his political career, a day after Victorian Opposition Leader Matthew Guy publicly urged him not to contest the next election.", "On Tuesday, Mr Guy revealed he had told Mr Smith he did not want him to run at the next election \"for the sake of the people of Victoria\"\u00a0after the Kew MP crashed his car on the weekend\u00a0while driving at more twice the legal blood-alcohol limit.", "Mr Smith, who held the opposition's attorney-general portfolio, resigned from shadow cabinet on Sunday after crashing his car into a Hawthorn home and then returning a breath-test reading of 0.131.", "In a 30-minute interview with Melbourne radio station 3AW, Mr Smith acknowledged Mr Guy had given him \"strong advice\",\u00a0but he declined to rule out running for preselection.", "\"I don't know yet, I'm reflecting on my position, I'm speaking to a lot of people,\" he said.", "\"I'll spend the next two weeks, probably more, reflecting on my life, on my job and what people in Kew want me or don't want me to do, and I'll make a decision accordingly.\"", "Mr Smith said he was \"so, so sorry\" for the embarrassment and harm caused by his \"appalling lapse of judgement\".", "
MP 'hadn't eaten very much' before crash
", "Mr Smith said he had been a friend's house for a couple of hours before the crash and had consumed \"a few glasses of wine\".", "He said he had genuinely believed he was below the legal limit when he got into the driver's seat, but \"I was clearly more intoxicated than I had thought I was\".", "\"I hadn't eaten very much all day, so as a consequence I blew much more than I ever thought that I had consumed,\" he said.", "Mr Smith said the crash had occurred when he was driving down a hill and a driver in front of him hit the brakes.", "\"I swerved to miss him, clipped him and ended up where I did,\" he said.", "He said he had \"apologised profusely\" to the owners of the Hawthorn home he struck and had offered to pay all damages.", "He also said he had spoken to his GP and vowed on air never to drink alcohol again \"whilst in public life\".", "\"I don't think I'm an alcoholic but I certainly have consumed too much alcohol on too many occasions,\" he said.", "Mr Smith's candidacy at the November 2022 state election has not yet been endorsed by the party."]
